DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and feasibility of the Fractyl Duodenal Remodeling System for the treatment of patients with poorly controlled Type 2 Diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Initial Clinical Evaluation of an Endoscopic Therapy for Type 2 Diabetes
